license.comment: The provided link is a valid license MPL-2.0 license agreement, but the license attached the at least once source code repository has been modified from the original MPLv2 to include (and not add) its (otherwise valid) Additional Disclaimer. I am not confident this is a legally valid way to add the Disclaimer as it seems to constitute a modification to the license itself.

clearOwnership.comment: There are several contributors to the repository who appear to be affiliated with "Dynamic Solution Innovators Ltd." which is not in the list above. This could be remedied by a simpler statement such as "Copyright (C) the project contributors", e.g.
